document_data.name: Sardukh
document_data.mainbody: '''Sardukh''' was a [[lich]] inhabiting the small island of [[Talagath]] on the strait of [[Talagath's Gauntlet]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p141">
document_data.Activities: The lich maintained a secret stronghold somewhere on, or under, the island. He did not welcome anyone staying on his island for more than a brief period, often sending magical creatures to encourage visitors to execute a hasty retreat.<ref name=EotSS-p141"/>
document_data.History: Sardukh was once a member of the [[Magelords of Mintar]].<ref name=EotSS-p141"/>
